Description: Large tattered fragment of undyed linen cloth; selvedge fringe Deir el-Bahri Type 2 (De Jonghe Fig.8); other edges are fragmentary; staining suggests use as mummy-wrapping. Worn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.28 ends per 10mm and weft 12 picks per 10mm.
